name: Otis – Your digital marketing assistant
author: Otis AI

sections.description:
Launch data-driven digital ad campaigns on Facebook, Instagram and Google in 5 minutes.

Our AI-powered mobile and web apps are designed for businesses who strive to connect with customers and generate results.

Otis is an all-in-one solution that makes digital marketing simple and accessible to launch and manage cross-channel ad campaigns using industry best practices to help you achieve 2x-3x better results, regardless of your experience level.

Here’s how it works:

  • First, sync your data-sources or upload your existing customer list in the app settings. With the help of this data, over time, Otis will learn which ads are doing best and deliver those ads to your customers while finding new customers similar to them. This helps make targeting more effective and improve performance.
  • Second, start creating your campaigns by selecting the social platforms you want to advertise on, customize the location and audience you want to reach. Then, choose a high quality image, write captivating ad copy, and schedule your campaign.
  • Finally, track your results in the app to see how your campaigns are performing. While you’re busy focusing on your work, Otis dynamically adjusts your budget to improve your performance and provides AI recommendations.
sections.installation:
There are two options to install the Otis WordPress Plugin:

Recommended Option:

As a WordPress user who also has the Woocommerce plugin, please go to your WordPress Admin interface.

  • Go to your admin dashboard
  • Find the “Plugins” menu on the left sidebar
  • Click on “Add New”
  • Search for “Otis”
  • Click “Install Now”
  • Go to your “Plugins” menu
  • Click “Activate” on the Otis – Your digital marketing assistant
  • Approve to enable integration of your WordPress site with Otis
  • Sign Up or Login to complete the process

Your WordPress site and Otis account will be connected and you’re ready to get started with Otis.

Secondary Option:

Manual installation method requires downloading the Otis plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

If you click the Download button above you will need to do the following:

  1. Upload the downloaded ‘otisai’ ZIP to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory using your favorite FTP application
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Requirements

  • Your website or blog must be using WordPress.org version 3.7 or higher on your server. We recommend the latest version.
  • The plugin cannot be installed on WordPress.com sites, as they do not allow you to add plugins or Javascript.
  • You must be a WordPress admin to be able to install plugins for your site. If you are not the admin, you can forward these instructions to the person who manages your WordPress install.

Otis – Advice and answers from the OTIS AI Team

How can Otis help me?

Otis is an affordable solution for digital marketing that’s simple yet effective.

You can launch an ad campaign with our intuitive workflow in less than five minutes for Facebook, Google, and Instagram.

Our data-driven AI will work in the background to find your customers on social media if you choose existing customers. For new customers, Otis will find ones with similar attributes as yours which means you get the best CPC (cost per click) on your ad budget.

How does the AI work?

Our AI is looking at your existing customers’ social media accounts, purchase history, and other items to find new customers similar to your customer base and connect with your current ones on their social media to retain brand loyalty.

The AI will also move your daily ad budget across all platforms based upon performance and provide recommendations.

What does the pro plan offer me?

Our experts will come up with an ad strategy across all platforms to make sure you are making the most out of your ad budget. Then implement those strategies to make sure your campaign launch is super successful.

All of our clients on the pro membership couldn’t be happier. Our team is committed to applying their expertise on your campaigns to reach that same level of success. If interested, you can fill out Otis pro plan inquiry and we will be in touch!
